scripts.test_root: concurrently "bazel run //:devserver" "while ! nc -z 127.0.0.1 8080; do sleep 1; done && protractor --suite root" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test_subpackage: concurrently "bazel run //subpackage:devserver" "while ! nc -z 127.0.0.1 8080; do sleep 1; done && protractor --suite subpackage" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test: bazel build ... && yarn test_root && yarn test_subpackage
